title: Some custom made emotes #3
body:
I'm back again, posting some emotes for y'all. I kept a lot of the advice from the previous two posts in mind while making these new emotes. Finished some requests, too! :)
I tried to make most of these emotes less BM educing by using self-deprecating humor and emotions people feel in certain events that many people can relate to. I also avoided using text. Hope you like em', guys.
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Cool-Zeds-don-t-look-at-explosions-Emote-698207412
Okay, this one is a bit BM. But the feeling when you get that fade away kill with your ult is just awesome. 
Requested by: ItsTragicYouKnow
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Flirting-Ahri-Emote-698207005
Cute. That's all I can really say.
Requested by: Ionian Vulpix
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Woah-there-man-Nunu-Emote-698207310
***"WOAH THERE, FRIEND."***
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/R-I-P-Maokai-Sappling-Emote-698206780
I'd see people using this emote when all their saplings die, without even getting to explode someone's face off. The remaining saplings even brought flowers :(
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Panicking-Zac-Bloblet-Emote-698206646
You know that feeling. That feeling when you're Zac and there's that one bloblet left, panicking to revive you while you cross your fingers and clench your butt cheeks praying that it won't die.
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Aurelion-Sol-Safe-Space-Emote-698207117
Some champions have swords, some have the ability to one shot people no matter what. Aurelion has a safe space to hopefully fend off assassins and other champs. And no, not in the SJW way.
######Heh.. Safe SPACE. Heheh..
Requested by: Itsbeghdev
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Dead-Shyvana-Emote-698206484
It's a dead Shyvana face. That's it. 
Requested by: RizHippoKhan
---
https://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Veigar-About-To-Ult-Emote-698206334
Veigar about to ult.
Requested by: Sad Tyrant
---
So what'd you think? Leave a comment or upvote if you'd like.
I'm open to any requests, too. Just try to not make it too BM.
---
Here are the other emote posts, if you'd like to check them out.
Some custom made emotes #1: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/eXetsraA-some-custom-made-emotes
Some custom made emotes #2: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/NiVemAlH-some-custom-made-emotes-2

#4 (NEW): https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/oQhsW8UH-some-custom-made-emotes-4

replies.body: Thresh thrusting his lantern towards the screen with his other hand pointing to the lantern.
Do Cho'gath going Nom nom nom
I'd use it for oneshotting.

Maybe an emote for someone who can't land skillshots?

Something like {{champion:81}} Yelling "HOLD STILL!"
It could even work for a healer, when you're trying to heal someone with redemption, but they run away from the aoe. :/

Gotta be {{champion:29}} :3
 "Hold STILL!  My eyes are on the sides of my head!"
how about voli, singed or urgot flipping a table

Some faces I would love to see.... Maybe you'd like one of em.

That sapling one is amazing. I'm surprised you haven't gotten a rioter's attention with these

> [{quoted}](name=OceanicEyes,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wQyHJyE1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-11T19:42:31.899+0000)
>
> That sapling one is amazing. I'm surprised you haven't gotten a rioter's attention with these

Thanks, man! And yeah. It's basically my dream to be noticed by a Rioter right now. That'd be so cool.
Its quite possible a Rioter has seen these but didn't comment.
I absolutely need one for when I miss a vital as fiora. I'm imagining her with hands and knees on the ground with her sword beside her in utter defeat.

just use the just right fiora.
https://i.redd.it/lssol36ymxez.jpg

It can fit just about every situation.

Get the sweet kill
Awesome block
Flashed into a wall
get killed like a chump
getting tilted

Its all these and more.

Really? You had the poles to see how many of us wanted the previous sets of emotes you came up with, but not THIS one???{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

In any case, I do like this, and think they would be fun to have in the game. If you can create one or two for Malzahar (who is kind of my main at the moment) I would LOVE to see that. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=animeboy2428,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wQyHJyE1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-11T20:26:42.575+0000)

> In any case, I do like this, and think they would be fun to have in the game. If you can create one or two for Malzahar (who is kind of my main at the moment) I would LOVE to see that. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah. I noticed as soon as I posted this. I rushed into the edit section, but it doesn't allow me to. :(
Also, thanks! Your Malzahar emotes are on the way.
Awesome! Thanks!
Wait. These are so cool!

Shen dashing while flipping the bird.

Shen sweating profusely as he looks between the map and his lane opponent.

Shen laying back on a pool chair inside his W enjoying a drink while people are trying to hit him furiously to no avail.

Shen doing his ult pose with the "menancing" kanji from Jojo appearing around him.

Shen underneath his turret doing Captain Falcon's side taunt where he beckons his opponent to come at him.

Shen dragging his spirit sword like it's a ball on a chain weighing him down.

Shen doing gangster signs while channeling his ult.

Shen's face looking off to the side as sparkles appear around him (kind of like the 'omg he's so handsome' scenes where the pink background appears).

Shen doing a superman pose while dashing.

Shen hiding in a bush and getting angry/stressed at his spirit sword because it's out in the open.

Shen ulting while saying "My planet needs me."

_________________________
As you can tell, my favorite champion is obviously Zed. Love that first one.
Tahm tipping his top hat as if to say 'm'lady' with a cheeky grin

Do Yorick when he is doing the animation of Q please

I LOVE YOU!! PLS MARRY MEEEEEEE 


speaking of which did you make a talon or shen yet? if not you can make a talon with a creepy ~~perverted~~ grin like hes gonna jump on you and do the gud stuff ;) and for shen you can make like calm and badass or a surprised and speechless at the teams stupidity ;-;

Rakan Partying

what about a jhin one for when you miss you forth shot or it gets blocked by a jax counterstrike, teemo blind or a fiora reposte
The First and The Last seriously stand out imo.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wQyHJyE1,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-08-11T22:25:19.159+0000)
>
> The First and The Last seriously stand out imo.

I try to vary the art styles a bit for every different emote to help the emote express what emotion or feeling they're trying to portray. The first Zed one was supposed to show the feeling of walking away slowly while someone dies to your ult. Not too exciting, but bad ass and confident. The Veigar one was more cartoon-y because instead of feeling cool, you get a bit of a 'lighter' feeling which is 'Woah, that's a lot of damage'.
I love all of these, they are funny as hell. Also not that BM which I really appreciate!
Yasuo commiting sudoku after a fail attempt of killing somebody or a jhin reaction of getting a quadra :D
cool, did you make these yourself?

> [{quoted}](name=Segius,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wQyHJyE1,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-08-11T21:48:18.142+0000)
>
> cool, did you make these yourself?

Yep! All of them.
cool!
Do one with tahm kench about to eat an ally with a horrified look on their face, please!
Raccoon Twitch emote please!

Riot if you're watching, please give this man a job, he's brilliant!

And I have a request for you, since you seem to be on a tear.

Can you make one of Nami blowing a kiss to a chibi Rengar stuck in her aqua prison? For when you shut down that pesky assassin as a support :P
Do Fat vayne laughing please :D

These emotes are so much more expressive and funny than the ones Riot is trying to give us, and if someone used these I wouldn't even be mad.
The Veigar one is cool :)
I love it. Ahri is perfect. You're really good
